question:
[Victor] is [Kerrie]'s older brother. He has never liked any of her boyfriends. [Brian] bought to dress for his father [Kevin] [Kerrie] took her brother [Victor] to the park, but left her sister [Machelle] at home. [Kerrie] and her Grandfather [Kevin] enjoyed feeding the ducks at the park [Joy]'s son, [Cyrus], was playing with his brother, [Victor]. [Joy]'s husband, [Harry], interrupted their play time. [Brian] took his sister, [Morgan], to a baseball game. [Harry] was so excited to surprise his son, [Victor], with the tickets to the playoffs.
Question: How is [Morgan] related to [Machelle]?
